name: Don't piss off Mom
description:
Do Not Piss Off Mom is a point and click prototype of a 'serious' game on mother mental load. Solve mini games, see what make Moms go berserk, and learn what can be done to reduce mental load.

This game was developed in approximately 10 hours during the Women in Games 2020 jam organized with  SideQuest on Discord, Sept 7-12, 2020.

The brief of this game jam was Motherhood : what does it mean to be a mother ?

I used the Segment2 editor (Studio Scrime, IdEx Bordeaux) to prototype the game. The art (except minor assets) and music are not from me but from libraries.

CREDITS
Art : Freepik
Sound : Freesound and Zapsplat

Everything else was made by me (game design, narratives, production).
